PROPER_NAME: This is displayed in the tooltip.
DESCRIPTION: This is displayed in the tooltip. Note, spaces are not allowed in NAMES. For multi-word keywords, see the next one.
Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest should use _ to replace spaces. In card text, you'll use the underscore versions.
Whenever a seed card is played reduce plot by 1. If plot is less than 0 at the end of turn add one Void to the draw pile and set plot to 0.
Whenever you play a seed card, reduce plot by 1.
Shuffle a seed into your draw pile.
The cows, chickens, sheep, and pigs in your farm. If you have more animals than your maximum energy at the end of your turn you lose HP equal to the number of animals exceeding your max energy.
